# StrawberryRhubarb

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Pies in ggplot, at last.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(StrawberryRhubarb)
library(dplyr)
ggplot2::diamonds %>% 
  count(cut) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(theta = n, fill = cut)) +
  geom_pie() +
  coord_fixed() +
  labs(title = "Hello, World!")
```
